data.actual_result: The everyone role is on the top of the role list when filtering
data.expected_result: The everyone role should be on the bottom when filtering, where it is in the role list, like on desktop
data.short_description: When filtering by roles in member settings, the everyone role appears at the top instead of its place in the role list
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a server you have permission to see the member list - Press the three dots in the top right corner - Select the filter option and observe the position of the everyone role in the role list that pops up
